meanings.definition: Relating to the study of the Earth's surface features using photographs.
meanings.sent1: The photogeological map helped scientists understand the land better.
meanings.sent2: The photogeological survey revealed hidden details of the terrain.
meanings.sent3: I never knew photos could be so photogeological!
meanings.sent4: Her eyes had a photogeological clarity, capturing every detail.
meanings.sent5: The photogeological images painted a vivid picture of the landscape.

meanings.sent1: The photogeological displayed layers of rock formations.
meanings.sent2: He captured a stunning photogeological of the mountain range.
meanings.sent3: The photogeological on the wall made the room feel like a science lab.
meanings.sent4: The photogeological was a snapshot of Earth's history frozen in time.
meanings.sent5: In the museum, the photogeological stood out among the art pieces.
